text:
François Corbier (1944 – July 1, 2018) was a French television presenter and songwriter. He was born in Paris. He became a television presenter on "Récré A2", a programme with singer Dorothée on Antenne 2, in 1982. He was a co-presenter of "Club Dorothée" on TF1 from 1987 to 1997. His best known song that he wrote was "Le Nez de Dorothée" in 1986.
Corbier died on July 1, 2018 in Évreux, France from cancer, aged 73.
